title: User Guide
subtitle: How to use InterTrader
body:
InterTrader is designed to help you take advantage of the price variations between exchanges. This is a quick start guide with purely the essentials for you to use the app. ## Getting started ### Get the app If you haven't already, download and install the app from [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=club.lambomoon.cec). ### Find some coins When InterTrader starts you'll be on the _Favourites_ page. This list will be empty, so click the _`Find some coins`_ button.
![Start page](/gin-data/images/1527767084077-start-page.png)
### {{list type=page}}
